name: Color Hero
storyline:
The NEW BREAKING TYPE of bullet hell (Danmaku) shooting game! 
 
If Can’t Avoid, Then Block Up! 
Bounce off the bullets and defeat the enemies! 
 
Once upon a time, Defenoidian lived happily ever after on Defenoid planet. 
All out of sudden, some evils came out from nowhere and attacked the 
Planet! 
Defenoidian s sorrowfully cried about their stolen colors and the planet!  
 
Defenoidians need your help to retrieve their planet back with the shield! 
And more, them to fight back their own colors! 
 
This is not such a cliché kind of game; don’t miss the game of 
Toss the Bullets from the enemies Back to Them!  
 
[Game Features] 
- Brand new genre of game that has never showed up! 
- Kick off the enemies by bouncing off the bullets against a volley of 
 bullets! 
- More than 30 adorable characters of Defenoid people! 
- Simple control with one finger! 
- Various levels available for the beginner to the master! 
 
[How to Play] 
- Defense or avoid the red and sparkling bullets. 
- Avoiding the laser beam is a must! They can not be defensed.  
- Don’t bump into the enemies! 
- Never leave the circular stage. 
- Defeat the enemies with the skills and the bounced-off bullets. 
- Achieve the items and become more stronger. 
 
Let’s go on an adventure with the Defenoidian and fight back the Defenoid 
planet! Reach the limits with the lovely Defenoidians! 
 
**The updated news will be uploaded on the Facebook & Twitter page.
